nodemcu-tools.snippets.dat: if not dat then print('No Dat Table') else for k,v in pairs(dat) do print(k,':',v) end end
nodemcu-tools.snippets.wth: if not wth then print('No Wth Table') else for k,v in pairs(wth) do print(k,':',v) end end
nodemcu-tools.snippets.wt: if not wt then print('No Work Table') else for k,v in pairs(wt) do print(k,':',v[1], v[2], v[3]) end end
nodemcu-tools.snippets._G: for k,v in pairs(_G) do print(k,':',v) end
nodemcu-tools.snippets._G.io: for k,v in pairs(_G.io) do print(k,':',v) end
nodemcu-tools.snippets.LFS list: for k,v in pairs(node.LFS.list()) do print(k,v) end
nodemcu-tools.snippets.LFS List: print() print() print('---------------------') for _,v in pairs(node.LFS.list()) do print(v) end print('---------------------') print() print()
nodemcu-tools.snippets.WiFi 32 IP: if dat and dat.ip then print('Got IP: '..dat.ip) else print('Lost IP') end
